title: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)1.
OB: The checkboxes in the export Zip feature do not use a busy cursor while updating.
EB: The checkboxes in the export Zip feature should use a busy cursor while updating.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open a workspace with many projects. 
2. Click on 'Export Zip'. 
3. Select all projects. 
4. Choose file types and select some. 
5. Press 'OK'.
